item.title: Luigi Mangione won't face death penalty in CEO murder case, federal judge rules
item.description: Luigi Mangione is accusing of fatally shooting UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson on a New York City street in December 2024.

item.title: Former CNN anchor Don Lemon arrested by feds over Minnesota activities, lawyer says
item.description: Lemon's "constitutionally protected work in Minneapolis was no different than what he has always done," his lawyer, Abbe Lowell, said.

item.title: Partial government shutdown on track for Saturday after Senate vote on funding deal stalled
item.description: The deal would address concerns Democrats have had about funding the Department of Homeland Security because of enforcement actions in Minnesota.

item.title: Sen. Tillis will oppose Trump Fed chair pick Warsh until Powell probe resolved
item.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell has said the DOJ's criminal investigation of him stems from frustration by President Trump over interest rate deci...

item.title: AI industry super PAC raises $125 million in 2025
item.description: Group using midterms to push for single, national AI regulation, rather than individual state laws.
